main event: A round silver object with erratic movements was observed over Uvalde, Texas on 4 October 1957.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a series of jerk-like motions., The object appeared to be illuminated by its own light., It was observed moving from west to east., The sighting lasted for one hour., The conclusion suggested it could be a ground-radar reflection or possibly a balloon.
location: E 5 miles S Uvalde, Texas, USA
